ing: 1 (15 ounce) can quartered artichoke hearts, diced
1/3 cup hot sauce (such as Frank's RedHot Â®), or more to taste
2 (10 ounce) cans white meat chicken, drained and flaked
des: "Chicken buffalo dip with a twist. This is a quick and easy recipe that goes over well at parties, luncheons, and family gatherings.  A great tailgate item. For hotter dip, add more hot sauce. Dish can be prepared in a slow cooker."
ins: Mix cream cheese, artichoke hearts, Cheddar cheese, ranch dressing, sour cream, hot sauce, and bacon bits together in a saucepan over medium heat; cook, stirring frequently, until cheeses are melted, 5 to 10 minutes. Add chicken to cream cheese mixture and cook until heated through, about 5 more minutes.
